title: BRIEF-Oasis Crescent Says HY Distribution Per Unit Is 52.2 Cents Per Unit
text:
BRIEF-Oasis Crescent Says HY Distribution Per Unit Is 52.2 Cents Per Unit

Stock Markets 32 minutes ago (Oct 22, 2019 17:36)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Oasis Crescent Says HY Distribution Per Unit Is 52.2 Cents Per Unit Oct 22 (Reuters) - Oasis Crescent Property Fund : * SHORT-FORM ANNOUNCEMENT: REVIEWED CONDENSED CONSOLIDATED INTERIM RESULTS FOR THE SIX MONTHS ENDED 30 SEPTEMBER 2019 * HY REVENUE UP 2.8% TO R58.6 MILLION * HY HEADLINE EARNINGS PER SHARE 100.3 CENTS PER UNIT * HY EARNINGS PER SHARE 99.7 CENTS PER UNIT * HY DISTRIBUTION PER UNIT IS 52.2 CENTS PER UNIT

BRIEF-Oasis Crescent Says HY Distribution Per Unit Is 52.2 Cents Per Unit
